about_the_game:
Rebellion is celebrating it’s 30th birthday and to celebrate we are giving you the Airborne Elite Pack for free.
The Airborne Elite Pack is a celebration of all things British. It gives you access to the stunning Lee No.4 rifle, an iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin for Karl and a Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod pistol.



The Lee No.4 is a British bolt-action rifle that was famous for its ergonomics and ability to lay down shots rapidly via the ‘minute man’ hold, a special grip used to grip the bolt to reciprocate the bolt extremely quickly. It offers the shooter great stability, accuracy, and with a 10-round magazine, is very versatile with the powerful 303 British round.



In addition to the regular assortment of rifle attachments, the Lee Enfield No.4 can be equipped with the rare 20-round extended magazine or the reduced lightweight 5-round internal magazine. Letting you lean in fire-support and rate of fire, or ultimate accuracy and marksmanship.
Combine this with the iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin and the Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod and you complete a distinctly British military look.

Included in this pack:
• Lee No.4 Weapon Pack (Rifle + Attachments)
• Parachute Regiment Character Skin (Karl variant)
• Union Jack Weapon Skin for Welrod

The Airborne Elite Pack is a celebration of all things British. It gives you access to the stunning Lee No.4 rifle, an iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin for Karl and a Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod pistol.

In addition to the regular assortment of rifle attachments, the Lee Enfield No.4 can be equipped with the rare 20-round extended magazine or the reduced lightweight 5-round internal magazine. Letting you lean in fire-support and rate of fire, or ultimate accuracy and marksmanship.
Combine this with the iconic Parachute Regiment Character Skin and the Union Jack Weapon Skin for the Welrod and you complete a distinctly British military look.

name: Sniper Elite 5: Airborne Elite Weapon and Skin Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i3-8100 or equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX12 capable GPU with 4GB VRAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-8400 or equivalent
  • Graphics: DirectX12 capable GPU with 6GB VRAM

short_description: Rebellion is celebrating it’s 30th birthday and to celebrate we are giving you the Airborne Elite Pack for free.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
